about:
I'm primarily a backend software engineer based in Fremont, CA!

Giving back to the community makes me feel accomplished. I love exploring about how technology can change the world around us and stay relevant by learning from the internet, books, and people.

I work as a software engineer in it infrastructure team at Tesla

help:
• path - display current directory
  • cat FILENAME - display FILENAME in window
  • cd DIRECTORY - move into DIRECTORY or just cd to return to root
  • ls - show files in current directory
  • history - see your command history
  • clear - clear current window
